title: connect to resources over corp DirectAccess connection
body: from bash on ubuntu on windows, I cannot connect to my corporate server resources via microsofts DirectAccess, I can however use our backup Globalprotect client and it works fine. Grrr. please help make this work

comments.body: I have the same issue, as a workaround I solve the IP address of the resource i want to reach with nslookup ( on CMD ) and then connecting using the returned IPv6 address on the WSL
